about_the_game:
The honeypot murders is a point-and-click adventure game that takes place in a colorful world inspired by mid-century cartoons. In this version of America, honey has been outlawed. You play as Arthur, a dim-witted drivers-ed teacher with a heroic sweet tooth. His friend and honey-dealer has gone missing and it is up to him to find out what happened.

STORY
America has banned all sugar products, but that hasn't stopped some resourceful individuals from creating a blackmarket, filled with beekeepers, molasses brewers, and other unsavory individuals. Arthur must delve into this seedy underworld to find his missing friend...and maybe score a jar or two of honey for his troubles.

FEATURES
  • Lie to strangers!
  • Steal all the honey!
  • Throw rotten apples at security guards!
  • Hand drawn!
  • Hand animated!
  • Fully voiced!
  • Fleshed out world to explore!
  • Cast of bizarre characters!
  • Chock full of puzzles and mysteries to solve!

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of addiction and substance abuse, coarse language, murder, violence, and criminal mischief.
